attributes.action: Compel all 0870 and 0845 to have a geographic number listed alongside.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Although for most people, 0870 and 0845 numbers are hugely more expensive than geographic numbers, businesses and other users of these numbers don't seem to appreciate this. It seems unlikely that phone package suppliers and mobile phone companies will agree to including these because the costs are unpredictable.

The best solution therefore would be to compel all users of these numbers to give a geographic number as well. Then consumers can choose which they use. Only businesses making money from their 0870 and 0845 numbers would lose out - and we don't want to do business with them do we!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
